Item ID1341

The black warhammer is a warhammer stronger than the steel warhammer. Members can purchase it from Vigr's Warhammers in Keldagrim and Skulgrimen's Battle Gear in Rellekka. The black warhammer requires 10 Strength to wield.

The black warhammer can be used as a substitute for a regular hammer when banging the big door at the entrance of Bandos' Stronghold in the God Wars Dungeon.

As with all black and white equipment, the Black warhammer cannot be made from raw materials using the Smithing skill.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The weapon's position on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

21 April 2021
(update)
  • Black warhammers now require level 10 Strength to wield instead of level 10 Attack.
  • The black warhammer's strength bonus was increased from 19 to 22.
29 March 2004
(update)

The item became permanently available with the launch of RuneScape 2.

1 December 2003
(update)

The item was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta.

[[File:Black warhammer detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''black warhammer''' is a [[warhammer]] stronger than the [[steel warhammer]]. [[Members]] can purchase it from [[Vigr's Warhammers]] in [[Keldagrim]] and [[Skulgrimen's Battle Gear]] in [[Rellekka]]. The black warhammer requires 10 [[Strength]] to wield.

The black warhammer can be used as a substitute for a regular [[hammer]] when banging the big door at the entrance of [[Bandos' Stronghold]] in the [[God Wars Dungeon]].

As with all [[Black equipment|black]] and [[white equipment]], the Black warhammer cannot be made from raw materials using the [[Smithing]] skill.
